title: Performance Page Load Event Data
description: Data payload for the performance.page_load event. Fired when page load timing metrics are captured via the Navigation Timing API.

duration.description: Total page load time in milliseconds.

domContentLoaded.description: Time to DOMContentLoaded event in milliseconds.

domInteractive.description: Time to DOM interactive state in milliseconds.

firstByte.description: Time to first byte (TTFB) in milliseconds.

redirectCount.description: The number of redirects before the final page was loaded.
